name: Goristro
resistance: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the goristro moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 38 (7d10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away and knocked prone.

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.desc: The goristro can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The goristro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The goristro deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The goristro makes three attacks: two with its fists and one with its hoof.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hoof
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 45 (7d10 + 7) piercing damage.
